data.actual_result: App crashes while changelog is open
data.expected_result: App should open normally without crashing
data.short_description: Changelog causes iPad to crash on iOS 9.3.5 [iPad 2nd generation only!]
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure your app isn’t updated to 2.3.5 - Update it from 2.3.4 to 2.3.5 - Open the app and wait for the changelog to open - Wait a couple seconds or while waiting tap on the screen somewhere  - Observe the crash
